original_title: C'est une petite chambre aux couleurs simples
overview: Mister Jones, old blind painter and admirer of Van Gogh, is looked after in a rest home by Bob, a young male nurse with whom he falls in love. As their relation evolves between fantasy and reality, the small room is transforming into one of Van Goghâ€™s famous paintings.
title: It's a Little Room with Simple Colors
